nodes.description: 周五，奎达发生了一起造成20人死亡的自杀式炸弹袭击。
nodes.support_text: ...the bombing, which had claimed 20 lives in Quetta on Friday.

nodes.description: 哈扎拉社区为抗议炸弹袭击而开始静坐。
nodes.support_text: Members of the Shia Hazara community, protesting against the Hazarganji suicide bombing, ended their sit-in late on Monday night...

nodes.description: 抗议者无视了地方政府要求结束静坐的多次请求。
nodes.support_text: The protesters had earlier refused to call off the sit-in despite repeated requests by the district administration and appeals of provincial ministers...

nodes.description: 周一，内政国务部长阿夫里迪等官员抵达奎达。
nodes.support_text: PTI leaders Sheharyar Afridi and Zulfiqar Bukhari arrived in Quetta on Monday.

nodes.description: 阿夫里迪探望了遇难者家属并表示慰问。
nodes.support_text: Afridi had visited the Imam Bargah located in Hazara town to condole with the bereaved family members.

nodes.description: 阿夫里迪与俾路支省首席部长会面，商讨安全事宜及如何结束抗议。
nodes.support_text: Afridi and Bukhari also called on the Balochistan chief minister and other political leaders to discuss the means to improve security and end the ongoing protest by Hazara community.

nodes.description: 在获得政府官员的保证后，抗议者在周一晚结束了静坐。
nodes.support_text: Members of the Shia Hazara community... ended their sit-in late on Monday night after receiving assurances from Balochistan Chief Minister Jam Kamal Alyani and State Minister for Interior, Sheharyar Afridi.

nodes.description: 卡希夫·侯赛因向黎明电视台表达了抗议者的诉求。
nodes.support_text: Kashif Hussain told DawnNewsTV that...

nodes.description: 穆罕默德·拉扎表达了对总理的期望。
nodes.support_text: Muhammad Raza, one of the protesters, said...

nodes.description: 抗议者要求总理伊姆兰·汗来到现场并慰问他们。
nodes.support_text: ...we want Prime Minister Imran Khan to come here and console us.

nodes.description: 抗议者要求政府采取实际行动，而不仅仅是口头承诺。
nodes.support_text: We want the government to go beyond words and do something practical for our protection.

nodes.description: 总理尚未慰问遇难者家属。
nodes.support_text: The premier has not visited the bereaved.

nodes.description: Afridi审查安全局势。
nodes.support_text: Afridi and Bukhari also called on the Balochistan chief minister and other political leaders to discuss the means to improve security...

nodes.description: 政府一直在努力确保此类罪行停止。
nodes.support_text: The government has been working to ensure that such crimes end.

nodes.description: Afridi向媒体发表讲话，声明联邦政府与哈扎拉社区站在一起，并将采取具体措施终结罪行。
nodes.support_text: Afridi spoke to the media and said that the federal government stands with the Hazara community and that concrete steps will be taken to end the crimes.

nodes.description: 联邦政府将履行其职责并采取具体措施。
nodes.support_text: The federal government will play its role and concrete steps will be taken.

nodes.description: 这些令人发指的罪行将停止发生。
nodes.support_text: These heinous crimes will end.

nodes.description: 一个未指明的实体想要在巴基斯坦人之间制造分歧。
nodes.support_text: They want to create these differences between Pakistanis.

nodes.description: 一个未指明的实体意图制造巴基斯坦人之间的分歧。
nodes.support_text: They want to create these differences between Pakistanis.

nodes.description: 一个未指明的实体想要在巴基斯坦内部制造冲突局面。
nodes.support_text: They want to create a situation of conflict within Pakistan.

nodes.description: 一个未指明的实体意图在巴基斯坦内部制造冲突局面。
nodes.support_text: They want to create a situation of conflict within Pakistan.

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦的敌人希望这个国家被列入金融行动工作组黑名单。
nodes.support_text: Pakistan's enemies want that this country be added to the [Financial Action Task Force] blacklist.

nodes.description: 这个国家被（敌人希望）列入金融行动工作组黑名单。
nodes.support_text: Pakistan's enemies want that this country be added to the [Financial Action Task Force] blacklist.

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦的敌人希望施加这些打击。
nodes.support_text: They (Pakistan's enemies) want that such blows be dealt.

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦（因所受打击而）分崩离析。
nodes.support_text: Pakistan should break apart.

nodes.description: 部长听取了关于致命自杀式炸弹袭击调查情况的简报。
nodes.support_text: The minister was briefed about the investigation into the deadly suicide bombing.

nodes.description: 首席部长秘书处在会后发布了一份新闻稿。
nodes.support_text: The chief minister secretariat issued a press release after the meeting.

nodes.description: 新闻稿称部长听取了关于调查情况的简报。
nodes.support_text: The press release said the minister was briefed about the investigation...

nodes.description: 持续的静坐抗议导致了主要西旁路被封锁。
nodes.support_text: 持续的静坐抗议导致了主要西旁路被封锁。

nodes.description: Anjuman e Tajaran主席Rahim Agha发表了相关言论。
nodes.support_text: Anjuman e Tajaran主席Rahim Agha发表了相关言论。

nodes.description: Anjuman e Tajaran谴责了恐怖事件。
nodes.support_text: Anjuman e Tajaran谴责了恐怖事件。

edges.support_text: The community had been protesting for the last four days against the bombing, which had claimed 20 lives in Quetta on Friday.
